ygData.subject: RE: Ogre bouncers (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe - nothing like 75pp to get your attention! When you get a bit braver you will find that you can shop at some other places as well.  I have gone deeper in
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe - nothing like 75pp to get your attention! When you get a bit braver
you will find that you can shop at some other places as well. I have gone
deeper in to buy fletching supplies and such.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 13, 2000 7:56 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Ogre bouncers (OT)

From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

I had never ever considered adventuring in Ogguk before (figuring it was
suicide) but am now looking forward to trying it again. I'm relatively
broke from buying all the gems for my lambent armor so figure Ogguk will be
a great place to build up my cash reserves.

Just thought I would pass this info along in case anyone wasn't aware of it.

Galtin of E'ci
30 bard
